summary: The Main Street Tax Certainty Act (H.R. 703) aims to make the deduction for qualified business income permanent under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. Introduced in the House of Representatives on January 23, 2025, the bill, sponsored by Mr. Smucker and numerous cosponsors, proposes to amend section 199A of the Internal Revenue Code by striking subsection (i). The amendment would apply to taxable years starting after December 31, 2025.
